text: Godalming is a town and civil parish in Surrey, England. In 2011, there were 21,804 people living in Godalming. == Transport == === Rail === Godalming has a railway station, Godalming railway station. The station is on the Portsmouth Direct Line, which goes between Portsmouth and London Waterloo. This line is served by South Western Railway. === Road === Roads that go through or near Godalming are: * A3 * A281 * A283 * A286 * A3100 * B2130 * B3000 * B3001 === Air === Godalming is around 31 miles or 50 kilometres away from Gatwick and Heathrow Airport. == References == Category:Civil parishes in Surrey Category:Towns in Surrey
title: Godalming
